rev.desc.rev.desc: $L.iscancel=nullsub($INTO.ISCANCEL, false) if $L.iscancel then ($L.warn.msg=scmsg(496, "ocm", {number in $L.file});$L.confirm.children.msg=scmsg(497, "ocm")) else ($L.warn.msg=scmsg(475, "ocm", {number in $L.file});$L.confirm.children.msg=scmsg(476, "ocm"))
Modified so that if you close a line item that has a parent, any children of that line item that are not closed inherit that parent.

modified child line item query to include the group parent if it is filled in. Before items in a group that weren't a group parent weren't found, so the line item was allowed to be closed without a warning.
panel: warn.open.children --> Changed exit from exit.normal to 'prompt.close.children'
added panel: 'prompt.close.children' --> This panel prompts the user whether or not they want to close the children as well
added panel: 'set.first.time.var' --> this sets $L.first.time=false. This panel then exits to the 'decide.action' panel which will now go through and close all the children since $L.first.time=false.

descript.descript: $L.iscancel=nullsub($INTO.ISCANCEL, false) if $L.iscancel then ($L.warn.msg=scmsg(496, "ocm", {number in $L.file});$L.confirm.children.msg=scmsg(497, "ocm")) else ($L.warn.msg=scmsg(475, "ocm", {number in $L.file});$L.confirm.children.msg=scmsg(476, "ocm"))
Modified so that if you close a line item that has a parent, any children of that line item that are not closed inherit that parent.

modified child line item query to include the group parent if it is filled in. Before items in a group that weren't a group parent weren't found, so the line item was allowed to be closed without a warning.
panel: warn.open.children --> Changed exit from exit.normal to 'prompt.close.children'
added panel: 'prompt.close.children' --> This panel prompts the user whether or not they want to close the children as well
added panel: 'set.first.time.var' --> this sets $L.first.time=false. This panel then exits to the 'decide.action' panel which will now go through and close all the children since $L.first.time=false.
